knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r setup}
library(ulid)
```

### One

```{r}
ulid::ULIDgenerate()
```

### Many

```{r}
(u <- ulid::ULIDgenerate(20))
```

### Unmarshal

```{r}
unmarshal(u)
```

### Use defined timestamps

```{r}
(ut <- ts_generate(as.POSIXct("2017-11-01 15:00:00", origin="1970-01-01")))

unmarshal(ut)
```
